hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that something wonderful happens when playing the Song of Storms after planting a magic bean.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Heart Container#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Bow#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #spider under a block in the Fire Temple# holds #a Hylian Shield#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ GS Skull On Fire

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Goron Tunic#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ GS Flame Maze Side Room

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^${12 48 31}Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Water Temple Boss Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest
